description:
In three days, a Union member will be on the move for a UMA investigation in Russia. Andy and Fuko head out towards Lake Baikal after being informed that if they kill that member, they can enter the Union. Escaping from Union pursuit, the pair make it to Lake Baikal but split up as soon as they arrive for Andy`s errands. Fuko meets a girl in an outfit similar to a Japanese schoolgirl uniform. She is enjoying watercolor painting and at her urging, Fuko decides to paint with her...
Source: Disney+
